hello.definition: Used as a greeting or to begin a phone conversation

world.definition: The earth, together with all of its countries and peoples

study.definition: The activity of learning about something

memory.definition: The ability to remember information, experiences, and people

language.definition: A system of communication used by a particular country or community

experience.definition: Knowledge or skill gained by doing and seeing things

mask.definition: A covering for the face; to hide or disguise

wreck.definition: To destroy or damage something badly; a destroyed object

fall apart.definition: To break into pieces or fail completely

feel sorry for myself.definition: To feel self-pity about one's situation

hold my head up high.definition: To remain confident and proud despite difficulties

ache.definition: To feel a continuous dull pain

addicted.definition: Unable to stop doing or using something

resignation.definition: The act of resigning; acceptance of something undesirable

fall apart: fall apart at the seams：分崩离析
watch it fall apart：看着它崩溃
feel sorry for myself: stop feeling sorry for myself：不再自怜
hold my head up high: hold my head up high：昂首挺胸
addicted: be addicted to：沉迷于；对……上瘾

study.memoryTip: 来自拉丁语studium，意为热情、努力

memory.memoryTip: 来自拉丁语memoria，记住的能力

language.memoryTip: 来自拉丁语lingua，舌头，因为语言通过舌头表达
